feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a required insertion of a new micro-authority block in LandingPage.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of short summaries for all major frontend components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining global OKLCH color variables and theme tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines TanStack Router routes for landing and all auth pages with a custom 404 component.
frontend/src/components/asistenku/Footer: Simple footer showing logo and copyright text.
frontend/src/components/asistenku/Header: Sticky header with responsive logos and navigation buttons.
frontend/src/components/asistenku/Hero.t: Hero section with image, headline, description, and CTA buttons.
frontend/src/components/asistenku/JoinTe: Call‑to‑action section linking to partner registration.
frontend/src/components/asistenku/Landin: Full landing page combining hero, guidance steps, pricing cards, CTA sections, and footer.
frontend/src/components/asistenku/layana: Defines an array of service plan objects with features, pricing, and WhatsApp links.
frontend/src/components/asistenku/Layana: Layanan section rendering accordion-based service cards from layananData.
frontend/src/components/asistenku/Penutu: Closing section with a single reassurance sentence.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, managing login, stored identities, and status handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom CSS variables for themes, including dark mode tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/client/LoginClient.ts: Client login UI with Internet Identity button and navigation to registration.
frontend/src/pages/client/RegisterClient: Client registration form that submits basic info and shows a confirmation screen.
frontend/src/pages/internal/InternalLogi: Internal team login page offering Internet Identity login and role-based workspace shortcuts.
frontend/src/pages/internal/InternalRegi: Internal registration form capturing basic user data and role, showing a confirmation screen after submission.
Partner login UI with placeholder Internet Identity button and navigation to registration.
frontend/src/pages/partner/RegisterPartn: Partner registration form collecting name, email, and WhatsApp, followed by a submission confirmation view.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, radii, shadows, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing required landing page updates, constraints, routing rules, and known issues.
